root: ^Residence of a well-known psychologist sir Robert Hilltop Montgomery 3rd.

theCabinet: ^"So, we are here in the cousy cabinet to try and find out what is going on."
^I think there is something wrong with me
wrong: ^I would be more than gald to hear out...
^I feel as if everybody uses me
^I fell like everybody is just tossing me around
^They toch me everywhere, it feels like my life is currency
dreams: ^I should tell you more about my dreams
cabinetAgain: ^"So, we are here in the cousy cabinet to try and find out what is going on."
^feel like we have already met somewhere...

s: ^I also have such a feeling but I was created recently

cabinet01: ^"You keep telling that your life is a currency,
^and we are here to dig deeper in your mind and memories."
blankstare: ^"It seems that you are in no condition to talk right now, perheps a short story will help?"
storie01: ^A lovely little girl was holding two apples with both hands.
^Her mom came in and softly asked her little daughter with a smile: my sweetie,
^could you give your mom one of your two apples?
^The girl looked up at her mom for some seconds, then she suddenly took a quick bite on one apple,
^and then quickly on the other. The mom felt the smile on her face freeze.
^She tried hard not to reveal her disappointment.
^Then the little girl handed one of her bitten apples to her mom, and said: mommy,
^here you are. This is the sweeter one.
^No matter who you are, how experienced you are, and how knowledgeable you think you are,
^always delay judgment. Give others the privilege to explain themselves.
^What you see may not be the reality.
^Wow, I need this to sink in
^Actually I am ready to share a story too, but it is a nightmare
nightmares01: ^So please tell me what kind of dreams do you have,
^I am ready to tell you the one that bothers me
^There is one that I can not understand
astonished: ^"Wow this is such news for me!" I have lived such a life all the time I remember."

s: ^"I am surprised but also quite intrigued"

nod: ^I nodded curtly, not believing a word of it.
coinroll01: ^Let's use the power of hypnose and see what your dreamstate will tell us.

s: ^Well if you think this is necessary

ending: ^And that is the story we wanted to tell you.
